content:
ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides Enum

Definition

Specifies which sides of a ToolStripStatusLabel have borders.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.BorderSidesEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", typeof(System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor))]
[System.Flags]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public enum ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides

Fields

All

All sides of the ToolStripStatusLabel have borders.
Bottom

Only the bottom side of the ToolStripStatusLabel has borders.
Left

Only the left side of the ToolStripStatusLabel has borders.
None

The ToolStripStatusLabel has no borders.
Right

Only the right side of the ToolStripStatusLabel has borders.
Top

Only the top side of the ToolStripStatusLabel has borders.
